name: .XES File Extension
summary: Learn about .XES files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: An XES file is a skin used by X-Genics eManager, a CMS used to manage X-Genics SmartApps. It contains XML-format data that describes how eManager's user interface should appear. Primarily, businesses use XES files to customize eManager's appearance for their organization.

content: X-Genics eManager (and its associated SmartApps) allows businesses to monitor and report on their performance and their compliance with regulatory policies. Optionally, businesses can reskin eManager to use a theme specific to their organization (for example, using their business's colors or logo). These custom eManager themes are saved as XES files.

instructions: For instructions on how to use an XES file with X-Genics eManager, refer to the app's documentation. If you want to view the XML data an XES file contains, you can open it with Microsoft Visual Studio Code or any other text editor.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
